data.actual_result: Current server shows in it's position on the server list
data.expected_result: Current server shows at the top like on 2.3.6 (6771) or right under "Frequently Used" like on desktop
data.short_description: Emoji drawer doesn't show the emojis of the server you're in at the top
data.steps_to_repro: - Update to 2.3.7 (6784) - Open the emoji drawer by trying to add a reaction - Observe the section at the top
